repo.name: optbinning

readme.summary: Well-structured README with clear installation and usage examples, but lacks configuration details and troubleshooting guidance.

common_complaints: Dependency compatibility issues (ortools, cvxpy, Python 3.13)
Missing type hints and incomplete documentation
Feature limitations (special value handling, split_digits constraints)
sentiment.summary: The optbinning project shows active development with engaged maintainers working on a 1.0.0 release, though dependency management and modernization efforts are creating friction in the community.
